aboutDescription:
In a glass, all waters look transparent and similar. In fact, they are all different! With different mineral composition characteristics, and its beneficial sides! 
Choose the WATER, not the bottle! 
Drink smart.

Water analyser gives you a list of goals: Water analyser gives you a list of goals your water is good for.
You will see the number of water brands: You will see the number of water brands in each category. Tap to view all brands.
This water can be caracterised as: This water can be characterised as:
extremly mineralized water: extremely mineralized water. Waters with high mineralization should be consumed properly. Very good source of minerals, recommended to be consumed in limited amounts on a daily basis.
very high mineralized water with lots of: very high mineralized water, with lots of beneficial powers. This kind of water is very good source of minerals, but it should not be consumed on daily basis in unlimited amounts.
highly mineralized water with a taste c: highly mineralized water  with a taste character. This kind of water is a very good source of minerals, it would be recommended to be consumed in limited amounts on a daily basis.
lightly mineralized water good for every: lightly mineralized water, good for everyday use.
10 high pH: This is extremely alkaline water it might taste a bit soapy. We haven't seen one with that high pH level. Please send us the information about this water.
very high pH2: times) more alkaline than water with a neutral pH 7, it should be very effective against acidity in the body, recommended for athletes and to improve overall health.
low pH: Slightly acidic pH in the water.
large Ca: a large amount of calcium, this water can be used against calcium deficiency and its consequences
significant Ca: a significant amount of calcium which might leave a slightly dry aftertaste
Mg high: lots of magnesium (Mg) - this is a real magnesium source, which you definitely should feel.
Mg large: a large amount of magnesium (Mg) which will be good for your nerve system, heart and sleep quality.
Mg medium: magnesium (Mg) which is considered as the fuel for the heart.
Na low: Water containing less than 20mg/l of Sodium (Na) can be advised for low sodium diet.
Na high: Rich in Sodium (Na) which is good for blood circulation and fluid regulation in the body.
K descr: It has some Potassium (K) which helps with the fluid balance in the body.
Li descr: As it contains a large amount of lithium (Li), it can be used as a water for good mood or anti-depression.
HCO3 high: A large amount of hydrogen carbonate (HCO3) will help with acidity and digestion.
HCO3 medium: Water containing this amount of hydrogen carbonate (HCO3) can be used as a water for optimizing digestion.
Cl descr: Chloride containing water stimulates metabolism and many other important functions.
SO4 very high: Very high sulfate content (SO4), this water will work as direct colon cleansing.
SO4 large: Water containing a large amount of Sulfate (SO4) helps with stimulating liver function, digestion, and can be used against constipation.
SO4 medium: Sulfate (SO4) will be good for the digestive system.
F good: Good for healthy teeth and bones, if the water contains more than 1,5 mg/l Fluoride it should not be used in large quantities on a daily base for kids under 7 years.
F some: Some Fluoride is good for healthy teeth and bones.
Si high: A real beauty and health water it contains a large amount of Silicon (Si) - the most important youth and beauty mineral which stimulates collagen synthesis.
Si medium: Silicon (Si) containing water is the source of beauty, good for skin, hair and nails.
NO2 descr: With this amount of nitrites (NO2) it is worth considering whether you really should drink this water.
NO3 50: You are a high-level experimentator. I don't recommend you to drink this water. It contains too many Nitrates.
NO3 20: Unfortunately, this is definitely not the purest water in the world, it does contain quite a large amount of Nitrates although in the range of norms. The maximum amount of Nitrates which is allowed for tap water is 50 mg/l.
NO3 10: This water cannot be characterized as very pure although the Nitrate level is absolutely in the range of norms. The maximum amount of Nitrates which are allowed for tap water is 50 mg/l.
NO3 5: This water Nitrate level is slightly above the average, but still,  the purity is good enough. The maximum allowed nitrate level for children and pregnant women is 10 mg/l.
No NO3: Unfortunately, I can't comment on the purity of this water. I need at least data on Nitrates (NO3) and Nitrites (NO2). Ask the producer, this information is not a secret, they will share it with you.

No data for Jean: Unfortunately, I don't know almost anything about this particular water, the manufacturer has not indicated the mineral composition on the label. So it's impossible to share an opinion on this water, as it can be anything, filtered, minerals added, natural, low, or highly mineralized water. Most likely it corresponds to the drinking water category, and it is not necessary for such waters to indicate their mineral composition and place of origin on the label.
notifMessage6: Water helps cleanse your body — inside and out.
notifMessage8: Water helps muscles and joints work better.
notifMessage10: Your body & soul will be grateful!
notifMessage11: Your brain functions much better if you are hydrated!
notifMessage12: It boosts skin health and beauty!
notifMessage15: Drink the best to become the best!
notifMessage16: While drinking water, think only about the water you drink!
notifMessage19: Superman drinks water all the time!
notifMessage20: Try to feel it every time you drink it!
notifMessage22: Start with water!  If you don't know with what to start, always start with a glass of water.
notifMessage24: Sit down, take a break, and calmly drink water.
notifMessage25: Sitting is best to drink water!
notifMessage26: Water at room temperature tastes the best!
notifMessage27: Pour your water into a beautiful glass and drink it with love!
notifMessage29: Know your water! The magic starts when you know more about your water!
notifMessage30: Say a few beautiful words to your water!
notifMessage31: Say Love, Health, and Happiness to your water!
notifMessage32: Know that the water you drink is happy to hydrate you!
notifMessage33: Stop for a moment! Remember something positive and drink the water with a feeling of joy!
notifMessage36: Drink water consciously, and you will feel its real taste!
notifMessage37: Please kindly recommend me to a couple of friends. Share the app.
notifMessage38: Train yourself while drinking water to think only about the taste!
notifMessage39: Water is the taste of life itself!
notifMessage40: When you drink water, remember that no other substance in the entire universe has such properties as water!
notifMessage41: If you love water, water loves you more!
notifMessage42: Water is life! Drink it with love!
notifMessage44: The real color of water is something like a rainbow, just mixing all the colors non stop.
notifMessage45: Drink some water and remind your friend to have some too!
notifMessage46: Good water is the best gift!
notifMessage47: Drinking water is like taking a shower from inside!
notifMessage48: Best ideas come when you are hydrated!
notifMessage49: All your liquids in your body change in 21 days!
notifMessage50: Good water means clear and bright thoughts!
notifMessage51: Maybe it's time to broaden your knowledge about water? Visit my website www.waterambassador.org
notifMessage52: One of the main ingredients for a good shah mat game is water!
notifMessage53: When you drink water be here and now!
notifMessage54: A Water Sommelier can taste the water only when he is present in the moment here and now!
notifMessage55: Remember, you are very lucky to have your water now!
notifMessage56: Serve some water to yourself and your friend!
notifMessage57: Water is the wise men's drink!
notifMessage58: Water is the only liquid our life depends on!
notifMessage60: Drinking water with small sips hydrates you better!
notifMessage61: People who choose water by taste are more connected with their inner world!
notifMessage62: The taste of water is the best tool for developing the intelligence of the senses.
notifMessage63: Water is the source of life!
notifMessage64: People who like water are very special!
notifMessage65: If you are reading this, you are on the right path!
notifMessage67: Water wears away the stone! Be patient!
notifMessage68: If you don't know what to do, imagine how the water would act!
notifMessage71: Hydration is the fastest, simplest, most affordable way to transform how you look, feel, and perform!
notifMessage73: Make water drinking a reminder for you to be present while you drink!
notifMessage74: Hydration is the root of all wellness
notifMessage75: Water is life, treat it with care.
notifMessage78: WATER, is the DNA of Life
notifMessage80: There are no substitutes for water!
notifMessage81: It's okay, you're on the right track!
notifMessage83: Water is a gift from the creator, Protect it! Respect it!
notifMessage86: Water, is a wonder liquid! Have some!
notifMessage87: The best gift you can save for coming generations is pure water.
notifMessage88: There are no identical waters in the world, as well as people.
notifMessage89: Water is more precious than Gold!
notifMessage91: Only someone who has been in the desert knows the real importance of water.
notifMessage92: Water: The original NO calorie drink.
notifMessage93: Water gives blood its ability to flow
notifMessage94: The most delicious tea in the world starts with the right choice of water. (Low in calcium and magnesium)
notifMessage95: Good choice of water is a sign of intelligence.
notifMessage96: Is the water you drink on the PickAqua list? Try to scan the barcode.
notifMessage97: Take action! Beneath a stone no water flows!
notifMessage98: The taste of water is best experienced between 9am - 11am, when hormone levels are highest.
notifMessage100: Drink water 30 minutes before a meal.
notifMessage101: To experience differences in the taste of water, it is best to taste several waters at the same time.
